entry.title: WIND WARNING , Maple Plains
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:42 AM AST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -8.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Maple Plains 2:00 PM AST Wednesday 25 January 2023
Temperature: -8.0°C
Humidity: 66 %
Dewpoint: -13.2°C
Wind: NNW 1 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 6.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this afternoon. High minus 6. Wind chill near minus 14. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Flurries. Low minus 10 with temperature rising to minus 1 by morning.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Flurries beginning overnight. Low minus 10 with temperature rising to minus 1 by morning. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Rain or snow. High 8.
entry.summary: Snow changing to rain late in the morning. Snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Rainfall amount 20 mm. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 increasing to 60 gusting to 90 early in the afternoon. High 8. Wind chill minus 10 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Wednesday 25 January 2023
